room_title: Escape room "The Experiment" by Streaper's Escape Adventures in Wabash
room_description:
You have signed on to be test subjects for a new trial drug from the well-known BioLogic Corporation.  You've signed all legal paperwork and you've acknowledged the risks of the drug you will be given.  You will be observed for 60 minutes and any serious side effects will be documented so that Doctor Ronald Vincent can make advancements to further his research.  
However, you know something about Dr. Vincent and his new serum MK-779 ... a secret that could forever change the world, and not for the better.  Can you find the reversal drug to save yourself from the final side effect and escape the lab with the evidence needed to put MK-779 in safe hands?
